DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose research evaluate effect home-based exercise program physical function improve health quality life HIV-infected older adult community .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects ask participate study infect human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , 45 year age old .

Subject exclude he/she history currently severe cardiopulmonary illness , severe orthopedic neuromuscular impairment , significant cognitive sensory impairment , history active malignancy , untreated depression , manic psychotic disorder , normal PPT score .
